pullRequest.title: [media.ccc.de] Add "recent" kiosk
pullRequest.bodyText:
I carefully read the contribution guidelines and agree to them.
 I have tested the API against NewPipe.
 I agree to create a pull request for NewPipe as soon as possible to make it compatible with the changed API.

Adds the recent page which can be found at https://media.ccc.de/recent
Tests are missing. I don't have time to add them now.

nodes.bodyText: do you know what's the difference between length and duration?

this returns an api link. Are you sure it is ok?
Without an api request you can build the uploader url, get the last part from this link and add it here: https://media.ccc.de/c/<uploader_id>
